serverUrl.name: Server URL
serverUrl.description: The server URL for the 1password connect service

lockToVault.name: Vault lock
lockToVault.description: Lock access to a specific vault ID

webhookUrl.name: Webhook URL
webhookUrl.description: The URL to POST to on event

fatalOnDisconnect.name: Disconnect on error
fatalOnDisconnect.description: Cause the bsb service to exit code 1 if the connection drops

endpoints.name: Endpoints
endpoints.description: The list of servers(cluster) to connect too

uniqueId.name: Unique Client ID
uniqueId.description: A static client Id - hostname is used when not set

port.name: Netflow Server Port
port.description: The port to which to host the netflow server on

itnPath.name: My ITN Path
itnPath.description: Allows you to change the ITN path

serviceWorkerJSPath.name: Service worker path
serviceWorkerJSPath.description: The /sw.js path on the client app

disposeAllLow.name: Dispose Low
disposeAllLow.description: Switch all output pins LOW when disconnecting

autoConnect.name: Auto Connect
autoConnect.description: Connect and hold the connection option

autoReConnect.name: Auto re-Connect
autoReConnect.description: When auto-connect is enabled, we'll try reconnect automatically if the connection closes/times out. If it failes, we'll throw a fatal

messageBuffer.name: Send Buffer
messageBuffer.description: OnMessage returns buffer instead of a parsed string

maxSessions.name: Max Sessions
maxSessions.description: The maximum amount of sessions to keep

maxSessionTimeout.name: Max Session Timeout
maxSessionTimeout.description: The maximum time in MS before a session is autoclosed

maxSessionTimer.name: Max Session Interval
maxSessionTimer.description: The time in MS to run the cleanup

multiTenant.name: Multi-Tenant Mode
multiTenant.description: If false, Client Key is used to lock down webhooks

serverConfig.name: Server Config
serverConfig.description: If not running in multi-tenant config, you can define the splynx details here

port.name: Port
port.description: The port to bind the server on

address.name: Address
address.description: 127.0.0.1/0.0.0.0 address to bind the server too.

httpPort.name: HTTP Server Port
httpPort.description: If using the HTTP server, the port to bind to

httpToHttpsRedirect.name: HTTP to HTTPS redirect
httpToHttpsRedirect.description: If you are using both HTTP and HTTPS, then we can automatically redirect HTTP to HTTPS

httpsPort.name: HTTPS Server Port
httpsPort.description: If using the HTTPS server, the port to bind to

httpsCert.name: HTTPS Cert File
httpsCert.description: The full path for the HTTP certificate file

httpsKey.name: HTTPS Cert Key File
httpsKey.description: The full path for the HTTP certificate key file

usingCloudflareWarpTraefikPlugin.name: CloudflareWARP Traefik plugin
usingCloudflareWarpTraefikPlugin.description: github.com/BetterCorp/cloudflarewarp is in front of this service

httpPort.name: HTTP Server Port
httpPort.description: If using the HTTP server, the port to bind to

httpToHttpsRedirect.name: HTTP to HTTPS redirect
httpToHttpsRedirect.description: If you are using both HTTP and HTTPS, then we can automatically redirect HTTP to HTTPS

httpsPort.name: HTTPS Server Port
httpsPort.description: If using the HTTPS server, the port to bind to

httpsCert.name: HTTPS Cert File
httpsCert.description: The full path for the HTTP certificate file

httpsKey.name: HTTPS Cert Key File
httpsKey.description: The full path for the HTTP certificate key file

queryKey.name: Query Key
queryKey.description: For WebServers to use query string auth instead of header auth

defaultTokenType.name: Default Token Type
defaultTokenType.description: The default web server token validation type

allowedTokenTypes.name: Allowed Token Types
allowedTokenTypes.description: If clients should only use certain types of tokens (header/query etc...)
